text: Zamagra amnezanku anumzane hu'za monora hunente'za, narimpa azeri oti'zage'na, kanive renezamante'na, kaza osu amnezantamima tro hunte'naza zantaminkura narimpa ahenezamantoe. E'ina hu'negu ru vahe asomura huzmantenuge'za kanive rezmantegahaze. Neginagi vahe huzmante'suge'za e'za, zamarimpa ahe avu'avara eme hugahaze.
